meanings.definition: A former monetary unit of the Netherlands.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people in the Netherlands used stivers to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I found a few stivers in an old coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The antique shop owner jokingly asked if I could pay with stivers.
meanings.sent4: His love for history was so strong, he wished he could time-travel back to when stivers were in use.
meanings.sent5: The image of the stivers on the ancient coin was etched in his memory.

meanings.sent1: She only had a few stivers left after buying lunch.
meanings.sent2: He saved every stivers he earned in a piggy bank.
meanings.sent3: The kids pooled their stivers to buy a gift for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of traveling the world seemed impossible with just a handful of stivers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the stivers jingling in his pocket brought a smile to his face.
